text:
"Itu tidak penting, yang jelas saya disini " - jawabnya, matanya tidak pernah lepas dari pria manis disampingnya .
Fot memberanikan diri untuk menatap mata pria disampingnya .
" Iya. Terus untuk apa anda disini. teman saya tidak ada disini..!! " - jawabnya sedikit meninggikan suaranya, ia terlalu gugup bahkan saking gugupnya ia sampai ingin manangis.
Gemini menatap mata itu, ia melihat bahwa pria manis disampingnya pasti sangat kecewa. wajah sih manis sangat merah mungkin ia menahan tangisannya
" Pergi lah tuan, tolong jangan menemui saya lagi " - ucap Fot, berusaha menahan tangisannya.
Fot berdiri dengan badannya sedikit oleng, namun secepat mungkin ia mengendalikan nya.
Sementara Gemini hanya mampu diam, Ia ingin sekali menahan tubuh kecil itu, tapi takut sih manis akan menangis jika ia mendekat
" K..ku mohon pergi... hiks.. hiks " runtuh sudah pertahanan sih manis, ia tidak kuat menahan tangisannya,
trans:
"It's not important, I'm here for sure." - she answered, her eyes never getting out of the pretty man beside her.
Fot encourages herself to stare at the man beside her.
"Yeah. What are you here for? My friend  is not here!!" - she answered loudly, she was too nervous and about to cry.
Gemini looked at those eyes and seemed to know that the pretty man beside her was disappointed. Behind his charming face, maybe he holds his tears
"Please go, Mister. Don't you come to me anymore" - Fot said, trying to hold her tears.
Fot stood a little shaky, but as fast as possible she managed to stand.
Meanwhile, Gemini kept silent, she wanted to hold that small body but was afraid the pretty would cry if she got in close
"Please go away ... sob... sob" Her self-defense was broken down, and she burst into crying.
